welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chiyoda-ku, a charming district known for its stunning gardens, historical landmarks, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting "HND Free Wi-Fi" and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, primarily used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
